author: April McLennan
title: Tasmania records three more coronavirus cases as health worker investigation continues
description: A continuing investigation into an infectious health worker at the Mersey Hospital in Tasmania's north-west reveals the person was only at work for 30 minutes before they felt unwell and went home.
content:
Updated 
March 28, 2020 20:58:15
Three more cases of coronavirus have been confirmed in Tasmania.
The three cases confirmed late on Saturday are in addition to a positive diagnosis revealed this morning.
Meanwhile, an investigation into an infected health… [+1634 chars]
